articles.title: Carrefour to halt Pepsi sales over price rises - BBC.com
articles.description: The French supermarket put notices on shelves in parts of Europe to inform customers of the decision.
articles.content:
Grocer Carrefour will stop selling Pepsi products in parts of Europe due to "unacceptable price increases".
The French supermarket put up signs in stores in France, Spain, Italy and Belgium on Thurs… [+3029 chars]

articles.title: Indian and European Space Agencies Are Teaming to Cast an Artificial Solar Eclipse in 2024 | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Proba 3 will launch from ISRO's Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle from India later this year. PSLV has embarked some of the most notable Indian space missions, including Chandrayaan-1 and Aditya-L1 solar mission.
articles.content:
While the inexplicable disappearance of our solar companion might've spelt a bad omen for our ancient ancestors, to astronomers, it is a real treat and a half.
